summaries.general: CompTIA Security+ certified cybersecurity analyst with 1.5 years of hands-on expertise in incident response, digital forensics, and vulnerability management. Proven ability to communicate technical findings to diverse audiences and drive measurable security improvements. Skilled in Splunk, Wireshark, MITRE ATT&CK, and NIST 800-53. Seeking analyst or SOC roles in dynamic, high-impact environments focused on proactive threat hunting and cross-functional security communication.
summaries.appsec: Technical support specialist and security analyst with a strong foundation in secure coding practices (OWASP Top 10). Experienced in troubleshooting complex systems, analyzing network data, and supporting secure infrastructure. Combines support expertise with security knowledge to bridge user support and infrastructure security. Excited to support geolocation and cybersecurity products in a high-volume, client-facing environment.
summaries.healthcare: Results-driven Cybersecurity Professional with strong healthcare and cloud security expertise. Passionate about access control, user record management, compliance (HIPAA/PIPEDA), and implementing secure, scalable Epic solutions for healthcare teams.
summaries.prs_canada: Cybersecurity specialist with hands-on expertise in forensic data destruction, chain of custody procedures, and IT asset management security. CompTIA Security+ certified with experience implementing secure wiping protocols, conducting forensic analysis, and ensuring environmental compliance. Also brings full-stack web development and ecommerce experience (Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, Shopify) with strong OWASP-aligned secure coding practices (SQL Injection prevention, XSS protection, secure auth). Passionate about sustainability and data privacy, able to bridge operational security and ecommerce infrastructure to support PRS Canada's mission across secure data handling and responsible remarketing.
summaries.ymca_network_security: CompTIA Security+ certified cybersecurity analyst with hands-on experience in network security operations, incident response, and vulnerability management. Proven expertise in monitoring and analyzing security events using SIEM platforms (Splunk, QRadar), implementing security controls (firewalls, IDS/IPS, endpoint protection), and conducting vulnerability assessments to mitigate risks. Skilled in network infrastructure management (TCP/IP, VPN, LAN/WAN, firewall rules), cloud security practices, and regulatory compliance frameworks (NIST 800-53, CIS, ISO 27001). Strong technical communication abilities with experience translating complex security findings for diverse stakeholders. Motivated to support mission-driven non-profits by securing networks and protecting sensitive community data.
summaries.it_support: IT support professional with 10+ years of hands-on experience providing comprehensive technical support across diverse environments. CompTIA Security+ certified (SY0-701). Expertise in troubleshooting hardware, software, and network issues; installing and configuring Windows/macOS systems; managing ticketing systems; and delivering excellent customer service. Skilled in Windows and macOS administration, Microsoft 365, Azure cloud services, and remote support tools. Known for clear technical communication, strong problem-solving abilities, and a patient, professional approach to user support. Experienced with Active Directory, DNS, DHCP, and capable of automating routine tasks using PowerShell and Python. Ready to provide reliable on-call support for hybrid IT environments.

experience.summary: Providing on-site and remote technical support to seniors, families, and community members for Windows/macOS systems, home networking, and mobile device troubleshooting.
experience.executive_summary: Established a successful freelance IT support practice, building strong customer relationships through reliable, patient technical assistance across diverse systems and environments.
experience.business_impact: Resolved 100+ support cases through a reputation-based practice, demonstrating consistent technical problem-solving, user education, and professional customer service.
bullets: Install and configure operating systems, perform hardware upgrades, diagnose and resolve system failures, and remove malware and optimize system performance for end users.
Set up and troubleshoot home routers, Wi-Fi networks, printers, and peripherals; establish backup solutions and educate users on digital hygiene and device maintenance.
Used ticketing and remote support tools to track and resolve issues efficiently while maintaining strong customer relationships.
Deliver clear technical explanations using non-technical language; maintain professional support standards and customer satisfaction.
Resolved 100+ support cases across a range of hardware, OS, and networking scenarios.

experience.role: Cybersecurity Analyst, Web Developer & IT Support
experience.summary: Led cybersecurity, IT support, and web development for a distributed remote team of 30 endpoints.
experience.executive_summary: Served as the primary technical lead for a distributed organization, securing remote endpoints and ensuring business continuity.
experience.business_impact: Eliminated malware incidents and account compromises through the implementation of strict firewall rules and MFA, safeguarding sensitive organizational data.
bullets: Provided primary IT support for 30 fully remote endpoints, handling VPN setup, endpoint patching, and day-to-day troubleshooting of connectivity and system issues.
Analyzed logs and network data using Wireshark and Nmap to troubleshoot issues and identify potential security gaps across the infrastructure.
Configured advanced firewall rules and multi-factor authentication (MFA) across all accounts, reducing malware incidents by 100% and account compromise cases to zero.
Conducted monthly system audits, identifying and remediating 12+ vulnerabilities.
Trained users in digital hygiene, increasing phishing awareness scores by 40%.

experience.summary: Volunteer supporting open-source education, right-to-repair, and sustainable technology practices.
experience.executive_summary: Advance community knowledge and promote privacy-first, sustainable tech reuse aligned with circular-economy values.
experience.business_impact: Helped organize educational sessions and advocate practices that keep hardware in use longer and protect user privacy.
bullets: Organized and supported community meetups on Linux, privacy, and sustainable hardware reuse.
Advocated right-to-repair principles and contributed to open-source education initiatives.
Promoted privacy-first tooling and secure operating practices across community members.

cyber.title: Premium House Lights: The Heist
cyber.executive_summary: Led incident response and forensic investigation of a simulated data breach.
cyber.business_impact: Resulted in company-wide adoption of network segmentation and improved access controls.
bullets: Identified root causes (unrestricted file upload, flat network architecture, excessive privileges).
Performed log and network analysis, and delivered actionable security recommendations to executive leadership.

cyber.title: LogHawk â€“ Security Log Monitoring Tool
cyber.executive_summary: Developed a custom log monitoring tool for detecting suspicious activity in enterprise environments.
cyber.business_impact: Automated detection of anomalies and potential threats, improving incident response times and reducing false positives.
bullets: Utilized Python and Bash to parse system logs and identify potential threats.
Published as open-source code on GitHub, demonstrating secure coding and automation skills.

cyber.title: P11: Secure Architecture Report
cyber.executive_summary: Designed a defense-in-depth network architecture for an enterprise environment, aligning with industry security standards.
cyber.business_impact: Created a blueprint for a resilient infrastructure that minimizes attack surface and ensures business operations resilience.
bullets: Designed and documented a secure network architecture for a simulated enterprise.
Recommended security controls and architectural improvements to mitigate identified risks.

cyber.title: P10: Forensics Report
cyber.executive_summary: Conducted a forensic investigation on a compromised system to reconstruct the attack timeline.
cyber.business_impact: Provided actionable intelligence on the breach method, enabling the organization to close security gaps and prevent recurrence.
bullets: Conducted a forensic investigation on a compromised system, analyzing logs and artifacts.
Reconstructed the incident timeline and documented findings in a legal-grade report.

cyber.title: Intellectual Property Theft Investigation
cyber.executive_summary: Conducted full-scope digital forensics investigation of IP theft.
cyber.business_impact: Delivered comprehensive report with step-by-step methodology and remediation plan, strengthening organizational incident response.
bullets: Used memory analysis, event log review, and network traffic analysis to uncover brute-force attack, malware deployment, and data exfiltration.

cyber.title: P7: IR Plan, Playbook and Policy
cyber.executive_summary: Developed a comprehensive Incident Response framework to guide organizational reaction to cyber threats.
cyber.business_impact: Standardized the response process, reducing chaos during incidents and ensuring compliance with regulatory reporting requirements.
bullets: Developed a complete Incident Response Plan, including policies, playbooks, and escalation paths.

cyber.title: P6: Cat's Company Vulnerabilities
cyber.executive_summary: Conducted a vulnerability assessment to identify and prioritize security weaknesses in the infrastructure.
cyber.business_impact: Prioritized critical patches and configuration changes, directly reducing the organization's exposure to known exploits.
bullets: Conducted a vulnerability assessment, identified CVEs, and recommended remediation strategies.

cyber.title: P5: Risk Management Case Study
cyber.executive_summary: Performed a risk management analysis to evaluate compliance with regulatory standards.
cyber.business_impact: Identified compliance gaps and proposed mitigation strategies to avoid regulatory fines and reputational damage.
bullets: Performed a comprehensive risk management case study analyzing regulatory drivers and compliance.

cyber.title: P4: Playbook for Cat & Box Scenario
cyber.executive_summary: Created custom incident response playbooks for high-probability threat scenarios like phishing and ransomware.
cyber.business_impact: Empowered the SOC team with step-by-step guides, ensuring consistent and effective handling of common security incidents.
bullets: Created custom incident response playbooks based on NIST and CISA guidelines for phishing and ransomware.

cyber.title: P2: Report on Risks & Vulnerabilities
cyber.executive_summary: Conducted a risk and vulnerability assessment to baseline the organization's security posture.
cyber.business_impact: Provided management with a clear view of security risks, facilitating informed decision-making for security budget allocation.
bullets: Conducted a structured risk and vulnerability assessment following investigation and documentation processes similar to incident ticket handling.
Produced a professional report with prioritized remediation recommendations based on severity and business impact.

cyber.title: P1: Network Administration
cyber.executive_summary: Configured and secured network infrastructure to ensure visibility and control.
cyber.business_impact: Established a secure baseline for network operations, enabling effective monitoring and unauthorized access detection.
bullets: Analyzed network traffic and connectivity issues using Nmap and Wireshark to simulate real-world troubleshooting scenarios.
Documented network topology and security controls for infrastructure baseline and audit compliance.

web.title: TinyApp
web.executive_summary: Built a secure URL shortening service with robust authentication and authorization controls.
web.business_impact: Demonstrated secure user management and data protection practices compliant with OWASP standards (A07: Identification & Authentication Failures).
bullets: Built a full-stack URL shortener with secure user authentication (bcrypt, cookie-session).
Implemented OWASP A07 (Identification and Authentication Failures) mitigation strategies.

web.title: Tweeter
web.executive_summary: Developed a social media platform with strict input validation to prevent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
web.business_impact: Mitigated client-side attacks by implementing rigorous input sanitization, protecting user sessions and data integrity (OWASP A03: Injection).
bullets: Developed a single-page Twitter clone with strict input validation to prevent XSS (OWASP A03).

web.title: LightBnB
web.executive_summary: Designed a property rental platform with a focus on database security and query safety.
web.business_impact: Prevented data breaches and unauthorized database manipulation by using parameterized queries to block SQL Injection attacks.
bullets: Designed a property rental platform using parameterized queries to prevent SQL Injection.

web.title: Interview Scheduler
web.executive_summary: Built a real-time scheduling application with comprehensive automated testing.
web.business_impact: Ensured application reliability and security through rigorous testing (Jest, Cypress) and CI/CD integration, reducing deployment risks.
bullets: Built a real-time React app with comprehensive testing (Jest, Cypress) and CI/CD integration.

personal.title: Resume Automator
personal.executive_summary: Engineered an enterprise-grade resume generation system that automates job-specific document customization with AI-powered ATS optimization and cover letter generation.
personal.business_impact: Increased interview callback rates by 80-120% through intelligent headline generation, skill reordering, and personalized cover letters. Created a reusable system for rapid job application customization.
bullets: Developed Phase 1 (ATS Optimization): Dynamic resume headlines, intelligent skill reordering by job relevance, and confidence-scored summary selection (+40-60% ATS matching).
Implemented Phase 2 (Impact Bullets): Multi-angle achievement framing (security, efficiency, team, business) for enhanced storytelling and engagement.
Built Phase 3 (AI Cover Letters): Job-specific cover letter generation with company research integration, recipient personalization, and tone variants (+40-60% hiring manager engagement).
Architected PII protection: Private profile data (git-ignored), example templates public, secure local processing with no cloud dependencies.
Technologies: Python, Jinja2 templating, WeasyPrint (PDF), JSON schema design, Git workflow optimization for team collaboration.

personal.title: Perplexport
personal.executive_summary: Built a custom CLI tool to automate the backup of research data from AI platforms.
personal.business_impact: Ensured data sovereignty and availability by creating local, offline-accessible archives of critical research and intellectual property.
bullets: Built a TypeScript/Puppeteer CLI tool to scrape and export Perplexity AI conversations.
Bypasses API rate limits to create full JSON/Markdown backups of research data.

personal.title: Debian Homelab Setup
personal.executive_summary: Deployed a self-hosted server environment to practice secure system administration.
personal.business_impact: Created a safe, isolated sandbox for testing security tools and configurations without risking production environments.
bullets: Deployed a Debian-based server with Nextcloud and Docker Compose for secure self-hosting.

personal.title: Knowledge Pipeline (PKM)
personal.executive_summary: Integrating a locally hosted LLM API with a knowledge base for secure information retrieval.
personal.business_impact: Demonstrated the ability to leverage AI for productivity while maintaining strict data privacy by keeping data processing local.
bullets: Integrating a locally hosted LLM API with Logseq for a cybersecurity-focused knowledge base.
Completed 30+ hands-on labs, outperforming cohort average by 15%.
Collaborated in simulated SOC team projects and authored forensic capstone reports.
Interactive Arts and Technology. Completed 60 credits.
Built strong programming, documentation, and communication skills.

certifications: A+ and Network+ equivalent skills through 10+ years of hands-on IT support and formal cybersecurity training; exam-ready if required.
